pyapp-kit/magicgui

Generates a GUI from a function’s type annotations

Related repos

  • Component-based boilerplate for NiceGUI applications
  • drag and drop tool for building Python GUIs, outputs clean code
  • Python framework for creating web UIs
  • Python framework for terminal interfaces with mouse support and markup language
  • GUI builder for the ImGui library
  • Text editor built with PyQt6 and Python
  • Describe UI ideas in text and see them instantly as working components, with easy tweaks and code export to frameworks
  • Text-based user interface library inspired by Qt5, GTK, and tkinter
  • C++ library for fast, minimal GUIs in game engines and tools
  • Toolkit for terminal user interfaces
